Killer Beez gang member Tamati Simpson sentenced for Ōtara, South Auckland murder of Faaifo ‘Joe’ Siaosi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/killer-beez-gang-member-tamati-simpson-sentenced-for-otara-south-auckland-murder-of-faaifo-joe-siaosi/26T53NQ5UBH5BMMONRW4BAFPDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/killer-beez-gang-member-tamati-simpson-sentenced-for-otara-south-auckland-murder-of-faaifo-joe-siaosi/26T53NQ5UBH5BMMONRW4BAFPDU/ Craig KapitanThe killing was one of two murder allegations Tamati Simpson initially faced. Mon, 25 Mar 2024 00:15:56 +0000 Faaifo 'Joe' Siaosi, 23, was shot outside his Otara home in May 2019. Tamati Kas Simpson was found guilty of his murder four years later.
